content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Add from_request constructor to McpCallExtractor that accepts CallToolRequestParam
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding from_request constructor
Add Result-based extractors for required fields to McpCallExtractor (get_required_string, get_required_u64, get_required_u32)
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding required field extractors
Add Result-based extractors for optional fields with type conversion to McpCallExtractor (get_optional_string, get_optional_bool, get_optional_u16, get_optional_u32, get_optional_path)
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding optional field extractors
Add specialized common extractors to McpCallExtractor (get_port, get_entity_id)
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding specialized extractors
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Create temporary direct parameter extraction in tool_generator.rs to replace ParamExtractor usage
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after modifying tool_generator
Update BrpHandlerConfig and handle_brp_request to not require param_extractor
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating BrpHandlerConfig
Delete the entire brp_tools/request_handler/extractors.rs file
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after deleting extractors.rs
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Migrate app_tools/brp_launch_bevy_app.rs to use McpCallExtractor.from_request()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating brp_launch_bevy_app
Migrate app_tools/brp_launch_bevy_example.rs to use McpCallExtractor.from_request()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating brp_launch_bevy_example
Migrate app_tools/brp_shutdown.rs to use McpCallExtractor.from_request()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating brp_shutdown
Migrate app_tools/brp_status.rs to use McpCallExtractor.from_request()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating brp_status
Migrate log_tools/list_logs.rs to use McpCallExtractor.from_request()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating list_logs
Migrate log_tools/read_log.rs to use McpCallExtractor.from_request()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating read_log
Migrate log_tools/cleanup_logs.rs to use McpCallExtractor.from_request()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating cleanup_logs
Migrate log_tools/set_tracing_level.rs to use McpCallExtractor.from_request()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating set_tracing_level
Migrate watch modules (bevy_get_watch.rs, bevy_list_watch.rs, brp_stop_watch.rs) to use McpCallExtractor
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating watch modules
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Delete support/params.rs file entirely
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after deleting params.rs
Remove all imports of params module throughout the codebase
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing params imports
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do a code review focusing on duplication, complexity, and validating the implementation
When code review subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
